title: Ai no Senshi Rainbowman
original_name: 愛の戦士レインボーマン
opening_song: ''Ai no Senshi Rainbowman'' by Mizushima Yuu, Young Fresh
ending_song: ''Aitsu no Namae wa Rainbowman'' by Royal Knights, Young Fresh
sinopse: In the mountains of India, a man named Takeshi Yamato gains the abilities of the legendary Rainbow Warrior, allowing him to transform into Rainbowman. With this power, he has to stop aliens from invading the earth.
